arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Rennes 3-1 Lyon: Les Gones concede their first defeat as Tyler Morton sees red
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 4, 14/09/25 Rennes have mounted an unlikely 15-minute comeback to inflict Lyon their first defeat of the Ligue 1 season. Les Gones surrendered control following Tyler…

arts.ttl: Rennes predicted XI v Lyon: Breel Embolo to debut in new-look attack
arts.sum: Finding a new striker was key for Stade Rennais this summer after they lost last season’s top scorer, Arnaud Kalimuendo, to Nottingham Forest. The club decided to replace his goalscoring…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Rennes: Martin Satriano on bench, Khalis Merah starts
arts.sum: Olympique Lyonnais delivered a hefty blow to arch-rivals Olympique de Marseille before the international break, scoring late in regulation time to win the Choc des Olympiques. It’s been a flawless…

Rennes have picked up four points from a possible nine so far in Ligue 1. After winning their first game of the season, they followed that up with a draw and a loss. Lyon have enjoyed a perfect start...
